title: What percentage is required to join Navodaya Vidyalaya for class XI? - Quora

response.answer_text: Heyyy I'm from JNV Rajgir, NALANDA The percentage for admission in class 11 is fluctuating. Each year cutoff there are different cutoff. It all depends on number of applicants, availability of seats and the region where Navodaya Vidyalaya is situated bcoz in some Region the result is higher than another region so, there may be high cutoff. It all depends on all the above things.

It differs according to the cut off published by different JNVs. But you need to score much like more than 90% because the competition is very tough for getting admission in 11th and the seats available are very few.
